description:
Try Lyft for a friendly, affordable ride whenever you need one. Request a ride with the tap a button, and get picked up by a nearby community driver who’ll take you to your destination within minutes. Yep, it's that easy.

•  All Lyft drivers pass comprehensive background and DMV checks
•  Drivers are rated by passengers and only the highest-rated drivers are allowed on the road
•  Lyft provides a first-of-its-kind $1M excess liability insurance for total peace of mind

Join the millions who’ve taken 5-star rides. Download and take a ride today!

—
What people are saying about Lyft:

“Lyft is the cheapest ride in the cities where it operates.” - Fortune

“Many young residents have embraced Lyft as a cheaper, more reliable and, well, more fun way to get around the city.” - New York Times

“Lyft is a real community — with both the drivers and riders being inherently social — making real friendships and saving money.” - Time

"As a passenger based on our test, it was way easier to find a Lyft driver than a yellow taxi or cab." - USA Today

—
For Lyft drivers, continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.
releaseNotes:
New in this update (v2.8.0):
• Share your referral code to your social networks in just one tap
• Behind-the-scenes bug fixes and improvements
